info.name: ITHAC
info.description:
### Server Responses

| Response Code | Details |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Successful |
| 201 | Created |
| 400 | Invalid User Input Or Wrong User Action |
| 401 | User Not Authenticated |
| 403 | User Not Authorised Or No Permission Privilege |
| 404 | Resource Not Found |
| 409 | Duplicate entries |
| 418 | I'm a teapot |
| 500 | Server Error \`you can ask for support\` |
| 503 | Error From Third-party Provider or Service |
| 504 | Down Time |

### Response Body

The response of this endpoint will have the following properties:

- `success` (boolean): Indicates whether the operation or request was successful or not.
    
- `status` (string): Provides additional information about the request status.
    
- `error` (string): Contains any error message if the request was unsuccessful.
    
- `body` (object): The Data if operation was successful
    
- `token` (token): this is the Json Web Token (JWT) used for authentication
    
- action (object): this is a map of instructions that the user or client is suppose to take

item.description: Adding Of Lessons to A Course
This Is For Course Creation And Management

This Contains All the routes need in the admin section

such as

- Authentication 
    
- Creating And Managing Of of Course 
    
- Creating And Managing Of Lessons 
    
- Viewing Payments
- Managing And View Subscriptions
- Managing And Creating Coupons 
    
- Adding Instructors or Contributors 
- Sending Custom Mail 
- Others
